title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: Get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models via Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LangChain LLMs & embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal UI (TUI) for chatting with Ollama models written in Python.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing Ollama models as inline GitHub-Copilot-style assist.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; Kotlin & Android friendly, async & sync APIs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators & embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, vision, JSON mode, LoRA fine-tuning, etc.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Unofficial Nim language wrapper for Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and strongly-typed chat responses.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama service containers in CI pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async client for Ollama API.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop GUI for chatting with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot bringing Ollama models to any server.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for local LLM queries.
